```{r}

```

```{r}

dd_test <- read_xlsx(paste0("~/Documents/pic-sure-metadata-curation/numom2b/inputs/data_dictionaries/", dd_list[1])) 
ds_test <- read.csv(paste0("~/Documents/pic-sure-metadata-curation/numom2b/inputs/datasets/", ds_list[1]), sep = "\t")

```

```{r}

varname_list <- c()
raw_val_list <- c()
decoded_val_list <- c()

decoded_df <- ds_test


for(i in c(1:length(dd_test$VARNAME))){
  varname <- dd_test$VARNAME[i]
  
  for (q in c(6:length(dd_test[i,]))) {
    val=dd_test[[i,q]]
    if(!is.na(val)) {
       if(val!="=Missing"){
        #print(val)
      
        raw_val <- str_split(val,"=")[[1]][1]
        decoded_val <- str_split(val,"=")[[1]][2]
      
        decoded_df[[varname]] <- replace(decoded_df[[varname]],decoded_df[[varname]]==raw_val,decoded_val)
      
        #varname_list <- append(varname_list,dd_test$VARNAME[i])
        #raw_val_list <- append(raw_val_list,raw_val)
        #decoded_val_list <- append(decoded_val_list,decoded_val)
      
      }else{
        decoded_df[[varname]] <- replace(decoded_df[[varname]],is.na(decoded_df[[varname]]),"Missing")
      }
    }
  }
}

names(decoded_df)<- toupper(names(decoded_df))
```
